# Susanoo: Chidori

## Quick Facts
- Element/Type: Lightning Release
- Classification: Kekkei Genkai~Eternal Mangekyō Sharingan, Dōjutsu, Ninjutsu
- Class: Offensive
- Range: Short
- Users: Sasuke Uchiha
- Media: Anime, Manga, Game

## Summary
An application of Chidori through a Complete Body — Susanoo, whereby Sasuke produces a massive Chidori with its primary left hand. In it, Sasuke also channels Chidori through a Susanoo arm he manifests to act as his own missing forearm.
